mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_gender,u.user_birthday,u.user_phone,u.user_email,u.user_add_time,u.user_upd_time,u.user_integral,u.user_avatar,u.user_status,r.role_id,r.role_code,r.role_name FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_role_relation ur ON u.user_id=ur.ur_user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id=ur.ur_role_id WHERE user_name=#{name}

SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_gender,u.user_birthday,u.user_phone,u.user_email,u.user_add_time,u.user_upd_time,u.user_integral,u.user_avatar,u.user_status,r.role_id,r.role_code,r.role_name FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_role_relation ur ON u.user_id=ur.ur_user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id=ur.ur_role_id
ORDER BY u.user_integral DESC LIMIT 19
SELECT ur_role_id FROM user_role_relation WHERE ur_user_id=#{id}

SELECT p.perms_code FROM perms p LEFT JOIN role_perms_relation rp ON p.perms_id=rp_perms_id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id=rp.rp_role_id LEFT JOIN user_role_relation ur ON r.role_id=ur.ur_role_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id=ur.ur_user_id WHERE u.user_id=#{id}
SELECT user_integral FROM user WHERE user_id=#{id}

SELECT b.user_id AS id,b.user_name AS name,b.rate,b.user_integral AS integral FROM (SELECT t.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rate FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, (SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY user_integral DESC) AS t) AS b WHERE b.user_id =#{id};
